thread.title: No. 2 Michigan State holds off Purdue 24-21
thread.title_full: No. 2 Michigan State holds off Purdue 24-21

author: NOAH TRISTER
title: No. 2 Michigan State holds off Purdue 24-21
text:
Al Goldis No. 2 Michigan State holds off Purdue 24-21 
Michigan State's L.J. Scott (3) rushes against Purdue's Evan Panfil during the second quarter of an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in East Lansing, Mich. (AP Photo/Al Goldis) Al Goldis No. 2 Michigan State holds off Purdue 24-21 
Purdue running back Markell Jones (8) is taken down by Michigan State's Jon Reschke, bottom, during the first quarter of an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in East Lansing, Mich. (AP Photo/Al Goldis) Posted: Saturday, October 3, 2015 3:21 pm | Updated: 3:45 pm, Sat Oct 3, 2015. No. 2 Michigan State holds off Purdue 24-21 Associated Press | 
EAST LANSING, Mich. (AP) â€” LJ Scott ran for 146 yards and two touchdowns, and No. 2 Michigan State held on through a lackluster second half to beat Purdue 24-21 on Saturday. 
The Spartans (5-0, 1-0 Big Ten) led 21-0 at halftime, but Purdue had the ball near midfield with a chance to tie or take the lead before David Blough threw incomplete on fourth down with about a minute to play in the game.
